instruction: 帮我生成一个 ELMER .sif 文件，核心是用 HeatSolve 方程，过程配 'HeatSolveVec' 和 'HeatSolver'，Solver 1 加个 Reference Norm，材料就一块。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Body 1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Heat Equation
  Procedure = "HeatSolve" "HeatSolver"
  Variable = Temperature
  Variable DOFs = 1
  Calculate Loads = True
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
  Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Heat Equation"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material 1"
  Heat Conductivity = 1.0
  Heat Capacity = 1.0
  Density = 1.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Fixed Temperature"
  Temperature = 293.15
End

instruction: 我需要一个 ELMER 的 .sif 配置文件，主要用于求解 Helmholtz 方程并保存标量数据，涉及两个材料定义。

! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Name = "Material 1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Body 2
  Name = "Material 2"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 2
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Helmholtz Equation
  Procedure = "HelmholtzSolve" "HelmholtzSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 1 Potential
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Helmholtz"
  Active Solvers(1) = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material 1"
  Helmholtz Coefficient = Real 1.0
  Helmholtz Damping Coefficient = Real 0.0
End

Material 2
  Name = "Material 2"
  Helmholtz Coefficient = Real 2.0
  Helmholtz Damping Coefficient = Real 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Name = "Boundary 1"
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Potential = Real 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Name = "Boundary 2"
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Potential = Real 1.0
End

instruction: 请编写一个 ELMER .sif 文件，用于弹性分析，包含 Global、Header、Constants、Simulation 和 Body 等部分，使用 StressSolve 和 ResultOutputSolve 过程，设置两个材料块，并在第一个求解器中启用 Reference Norm。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.vtu
End

Body 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Body 2
  Name = "Material2"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 2
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Stress Analysis
  Procedure = "StressSolve" "StressSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 3 Displacement
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
  Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Solver 2
  Equation = Result Output
  Procedure = "ResultOutputSolve" "ResultOutputSolver"
  Output File Name = case
  Exec Solver = After Saving
  Vtu Format = True
  Binary Output = True
  Single Precision = True
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Elasticity"
  Stress Analysis = True
  Active Solvers(2) = 1 2
End

Material 1
  Name = "Steel"
  Youngs modulus = 210.0e9
  Poisson ratio = 0.3
  Density = 7850
End

Material 2
  Name = "Aluminum"
  Youngs modulus = 70.0e9
  Poisson ratio = 0.33
  Density = 2700
End

instruction: 背景是热分析模拟，需要生成 ELMER 输入文件。请先定义文件的基本结构和常数，然后设置热求解方程与输出过程，最后为求解器配置参考范数并指定单一材料。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.vtu
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "BodyProperty"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Heat Equation
  Procedure = "HeatSolve" "HeatSolver"
  Variable = Temperature
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
End

Solver 2
  Equation = SaveScalars
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveScalars"
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Filename = "heat_flux.dat"
End

Solver 3
  Equation = SaveLine
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveLine"
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Polyline Coordinates(2,2) = 0 0 1 0
  Polyline Divisions = 100
  Filename = "temperature_line.dat"
End

Equation 1
  Name = "HeatEquation"
  Active Solvers(3) = 1 2 3
End

Material 1
  Name = "GenericMaterial"
  Heat Conductivity = 1.0
  Heat Capacity = 1.0
  Density = 1.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "FixedTemperature"
  Temperature = 300.0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Name = "HeatFlux"
  Heat Flux = 1000.0
End

instruction: 请帮我写个 ELMER 的 .sif 文件，用来做磁动力学相关的计算，要包含方程、求解器和材料这些基本部分，具体参数你看着设。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "mesh3d"
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Transient
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 2
  Timestep intervals = 100
  Timestep Sizes = 0.01
  Use Mesh Names = Logical True
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "BodyProperty1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
  Body Force = 1
End

Body 2
  Target Bodies(1) = 2
  Name = "BodyProperty2"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 2
  Body Force = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Magnetic Vector Potential
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamics"
  Variable = -dofs 3 A
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
End

Solver 2
  Equation = Magnetic Field Strength
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields"
  Variable = -dofs 3 H
  Calculate Magnetic Field Strength = Logical True
  Calculate Magnetic Flux Density = Logical True
  Calculate Joule Heating = Logical True
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Stabilize = True
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Magnetodynamics"
  Active Solvers(2) = 1 2
End

Material 1
  Name = "Air"
  Relative Permeability = 1.0
  Electric Conductivity = 0.0
End

Material 2
  Name = "Copper"
  Relative Permeability = 0.999994
  Electric Conductivity = 5.96e7
End

Body Force 1
  Name = "CurrentSource"
  Current Density = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "MagneticInsulation"
  A {e} = 0.0
  H {e} = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Name = "TangentialField"
  Magnetic Field Strength 2 = 1000.0
End

instruction: 请编写一个可运行的 ELMER .sif 文件，需包含 Global、Header、Simulation、Equation 及多个 Solver 等共 14 个 section。方程需使用 'mgdyn'、'MGDynamicsCalc'、'result output'、'Helmholtz projection' 和 'Remove kernel component'。求解过程需包含 'MagnetoDynamics' 'WhitneyAVSolver'、'MagnetoDynamics' 'MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields'、'ResultOutputSolve' 'ResultOutputSolver'、'SaveData' 'SaveScalars'、'HelmholtzProjection' 'HelmholtzProjector' 和 'HelmholtzProjection' 'RemoveKernelComponent'。同时，在 Solver 4 中设置 Reference Norm 与 Reference Norm Tolerance 参数，并定义一个材料块。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.vtu
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Body Property 1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "Air"
  Electric Conductivity = 0.0
  Relative Permeability = 1.0
  Heat Conductivity = 0.025
  Heat Capacity = 1005.0
  Density = 1.205
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Equation 1"
  Active Solvers(6) = 1 2 3 4 5 6
End

Solver 1
  Equation = mgdyn
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "WhitneyAVSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 1 A
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1.0
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 10
  Linear System Precondition Recompute = 1
End

Solver 2
  Equation = MGDynamicsCalc
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields"
  Exec Solver = After Saving
  Stabilize = True
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Calculate Electric Field = True
  Calculate Magnetic Field Strength = True
  Calculate Magnetic Flux Density = True
  Calculate Current Density = True
  Calculate Joule Heating = True
  Calculate Maxwell Stress = True
  Calculate Nodal Forces = True
End

Solver 3
  Equation = result output
  Procedure = "ResultOutputSolve" "ResultOutputSolver"
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Output File Name = case
  Output Format = Vtu
  Vtu Format = True
  Single Precision = False
  Binary Output = True
  Save Geometry Ids = True
End

Solver 4
  Equation = SaveData
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveScalars"
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Filename = scalars.dat
  Variable 1 = A
  Operator 1 = max
  Variable 2 = Magnetic Flux Density
  Operator 2 = max
  Reference Norm = 1.0
  Reference Norm Tolerance = 1.0e-6
End

Solver 5
  Equation = Helmholtz projection
  Procedure = "HelmholtzProjection" "HelmholtzProjector"
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Variable = -dofs 1 A
  Projector Variable = Phi
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = CG
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-10
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
End

Solver 6
  Equation = Remove kernel component
  Procedure = "HelmholtzProjection" "RemoveKernelComponent"
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Variable = -dofs 1 A
  Projector Variable = Phi
  Linear System Solver = Direct
  Linear System Direct Method = UMFPack
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Boundary Condition 1"
  A = 0
  A {e} = 0 0 0
End

  Linear System Max Iterations = 200
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 10
End

  Name = "Magnetodynamics Coupled"

  Joule Heating = Logical True
  Calculate Joule Heating = Logical True
End

  A 2 = 0.0
  A 3 = 0.0

instruction: 请编写一个可运行的 ELMER .sif 文件，需包含 Header、Constants、Simulation、Body、Body、Solver 等 17 个 section，并设置求解器方程为 Navier-Stokes、Free 和 Mesh Update，求解过程为 FreeSurfaceSolver，同时为 Solver 3 添加 Reference Norm 扩展项，材料块数量为 1。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "MESHDIR/Mesh1"
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Transient
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 2
  Timestep Sizes = 0.1
  Timestep Intervals = 10
  Output Intervals = 1
  Use Mesh Names = Logical True
End

Solver 1
  Equation = Navier-Stokes
  Variable = Flow Solution[Velocity:3 Pressure:1]
  Procedure = "FlowSolve" "FlowSolver"
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Row Equilibration = True
  Block Preconditioning = True
  Use Velocity Laplacian = True
End

Solver 2
  Equation = Free
  Procedure = "FreeSurfaceSolver" "FreeSurfaceSolver"
  Variable = FreeSurface[FreeSurface:1]
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True

instruction: 我打算用 ELMER 做结构分析，需要生成对应的 .sif 文件。背景是模拟包含两种材料的弹性体。请先设置好文件的基本框架和常数，然后分别配置三维弹性方程和壳方程的求解器与过程，最后确保能保存所需标量数据。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "shell_and_solid"
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.vtu
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Name = "Body1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Body 2
  Name = "Body2"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 2
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "Elasticity"
  Procedure = "ElasticSolve" "ElasticSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 3 Displacement
  Eigen System Values = Logical True
  Eigen System Select = Smallest magnitude
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System Residual Output = 10
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Calculate Stresses = Logical True
  Calculate Principal = Logical True
  Calculate Strains = Logical True
End

Solver 2
  Equation = "Shell Equation"
  Procedure = "ShellSolver" "ShellSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 6 Displacement
  Eigen System Values = Logical True
  Eigen System Select = Smallest magnitude
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System Residual Output = 10
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 1
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Calculate Stresses = Logical True
  Calculate Principal = Logical True
  Calculate Strains = Logical True
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Structural"
  Active Solvers(2) = 1 2
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Density = 2700
  Youngs modulus = 70.0e9
  Poisson ratio = 0.33
End

Material 2
  Name = "Material2"
  Density = 7800
  Youngs modulus = 210.0e9
  Poisson ratio = 0.30
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Fixed"
  Displacement 1 = 0
  Displacement 2 = 0
  Displacement 3 = 0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Name = "Loaded"
  Force 1 = 0
  Force 2 = 1000
  Force 3 = 0
End

instruction: 请编写一个可运行的 ELMER .sif 文件，需包含 Global、Header、Simulation、Body、Material 等部分，设置求解器方程为 MGDynamics、MGDynamicsCalc、ResultOutput 和 SaveScalars，并配置 MagnetoDynamics WhitneyAVSolver、MagnetoDynamicsCalcFields、ResultOutputSolver 和 SaveScalars 求解过程，同时为 Solver 4 添加 Reference Norm 扩展项，材料块数量为 1。
samples:
Header
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 4
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Transient
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 2
  Timestep intervals = 1
  Timestep Sizes = 1.0
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.ep
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Name = "Body1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
  Body Force = 1
  Initial Condition = 1
End

Material 1
  Name = "Material1"
  Electric Conductivity = 1.0e6
  Relative Permeability = 1.0
  Heat Conductivity = 1.0
  Heat Capacity = 1.0
  Density = 1.0
End

Solver 1
  Equation = MGDynamics
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsWhitneyAVSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 1 "Magnetic Vector Potential"
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20

instruction: 我需要一个用于磁动力学谐波场计算的 ELMER .sif 配置文件，主要涉及几个特定的求解器和输出设置。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "TEAM30a_3ph"
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 4
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.vtu
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Body 1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
  Body Force = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = MgHarmonic
  Procedure = "MagnetoDynamics" "MagnetoDynamicsHarmonic"
  Variable = -dofs 2 Potential
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 10
  BiCGstabl polynomial degree = 2
  Linear System Row Equilibration = Logical True
  Linear System Scaling = Logical False
  Linear System Complex = Logical True
  Angular Frequency = Real 314.159
  Calculate Joule Heating = Logical True
  Calculate Magnetic Field Strength = Logical True
  Calculate Magnetic Flux Density = Logical True
  Calculate Maxwell Stress = Logical True
  Calculate Nodal Forces = Logical True
  Calculate Electric Field = Logical True
  Calculate Current Density = Logical True
End

Solver 2
  Equation = Heat Equation
  Procedure = "HeatSolve" "HeatSolver"
  Variable = Temperature
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU1
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 10
  BiCGstabl polynomial degree = 2
  Linear System Row Equilibration = Logical True
  Linear System Scaling = Logical False
End

Solver 3
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Equation = SaveScalars
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveScalars"
  Filename = "scalars.dat"
  Variable 1 = Potential
  Operator 1 = boundary int
  Variable 2 = Magnetic Flux Density
  Operator 2 = boundary int
  Variable 3 = Joule Heating
  Operator 3 = volume int
End

Solver 4
  Exec Solver = After Timestep
  Equation = SaveLine
  Procedure = "SaveData" "SaveLine"
  Filename = "line.dat"
  Polyline Coordinates(2,2) = 0.0 0.0 1.0 1.0
  Variable 1 = Potential
  Variable 2 = Magnetic Flux Density
  Variable 3 = Electric Field
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Equation 1"
  Active Solvers(4) = 1 2 3 4
  MgHarmonic = Logical True
  Heat Equation = Logical True
End

Material 1
  Name = "Air"
  Electric Conductivity = 0.0
  Relative Permeability = 1.0
  Heat Conductivity = 0.026
  Heat Capacity = 1005.0
  Density = 1.205
End

Body Force 1
  Name = "Source"
  Current Density = 1.0e6
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Magnetic Wall"
  Magnetic Flux Density 1 = 0.0
  Magnetic Flux Density 2 = 0.0
  Magnetic Flux Density 3 = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Name = "Electric Potential"
  Potential 1 = 0.0
  Potential 2 = 0.0
End

Boundary Condition 3
  Target Boundaries(1) = 3
  Name = "Thermal Insulation"
  Heat Flux = 0.0
End

instruction: 我需要用 ELMER 进行梁结构分析。请准备输入文件，包含必要的全局设置、求解器（使用 Timoshenko 方程和指定过程，并在第一个求解器中设置参考范数）以及一个材料定义和两个边界条件。
samples:
Header
  Mesh DB "." "spring"
! Mesh DB "." "."
! Include Path ""
! Results Directory ""
End

Simulation
  Max Output Level = 5
  Coordinate System = Cartesian
  Coordinate Mapping(3) = 1 2 3
  Simulation Type = Steady state
  Steady State Max Iterations = 1
  Output Intervals = 1
  Timestepping Method = BDF
  BDF Order = 1
  Solver Input File = case.sif
  Post File = case.vtu
End

Constants
  Gravity(4) = 0 -1 0 9.82
  Stefan Boltzmann = 5.67e-08
  Permittivity of Vacuum = 8.8542e-12
  Boltzmann Constant = 1.3807e-23
  Unit Charge = 1.602e-19
End

Body 1
  Target Bodies(1) = 1
  Name = "Body 1"
  Equation = 1
  Material = 1
End

Solver 1
  Equation = "Timoshenko Beam"
  Procedure = "TimoshenkoBeam" "TimoshenkoBeamSolver"
  Variable = -dofs 6 Displacement
  Exec Solver = Always
  Stabilize = True
  Bubbles = False
  Lumped Mass Matrix = False
  Optimize Bandwidth = True
  Steady State Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-5
  Nonlinear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-7
  Nonlinear System Max Iterations = 20
  Nonlinear System Newton After Iterations = 3
  Nonlinear System Newton After Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Nonlinear System Relaxation Factor = 1
  Linear System Solver = Iterative
  Linear System Iterative Method = BiCGStab
  Linear System Max Iterations = 500
  Linear System Convergence Tolerance = 1.0e-8
  Linear System Preconditioning = ILU0
  Linear System ILUT Tolerance = 1.0e-3
  Linear System Abort Not Converged = False
  Linear System Residual Output = 1
  Linear System Reference Norm = 1.0
End

Solver 2
  Equation = "ResultOutput"
  Procedure = "ResultOutputSolve" "ResultOutputSolver"
  Output File Name = "case"
  Exec Solver = After Saving
  Vtu Format = True
End

Equation 1
  Name = "Equation 1"
  Timoshenko Beam = True
  Active Solvers(2) = 1 2
End

Material 1
  Name = "Steel"
  Density = 7850
  Youngs Modulus = 2.0e11
  Poisson Ratio = 0.3
End

Boundary Condition 1
  Target Boundaries(1) = 1
  Name = "Fixed"
  Displacement 1 = 0
  Displacement 2 = 0
  Displacement 3 = 0
  Rotation 1 = 0
  Rotation 2 = 0
  Rotation 3 = 0
End

Boundary Condition 2
  Target Boundaries(1) = 2
  Name = "Load"
  Force 2 = -1000
End
